name: All For One (itch) (DigitApps)
description:
All For One is a unique minimalist  puzzle game where you're  a red rectangle with yellow clones that try to follow your movement (ONLY ONE Controller) and can only progress to next level if you're the ONLY ONE left therefore You must find ways to sacrifice the clones. 

To help you can spawan  a blue  block to help you by clicking on the position where you need it.  Use the block by jumping on it or using it to prevent movement bet you also have ONLY one and placing it somewhere removes it from the previous location. 

NOTE: you shouldn't be able to spawn a block while any player or clone is in the air but a glitch/bug makes it so you can. 

To get the intended experience don't do this but you can also use it as a way to solve levels you cant figure out. 

Controls :

A and D or side arrow keys to move

Spacebar to jump

Left click to spawn your block. 

Background music by 

Alexandros  Icydemon Koutroulis (icyd3mon@gmail.com)
